noun.orange: A large round juicy citrus fruit with a tough bright reddish-yellow rind
noun.lemon: A pale yellow oval citrus fruit with thick skin and fragrant, acidic juice
noun.sofa: long upholstered seat with a back and arms, for two or more people
noun.table: piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, providing a level surface for eating, writing, or working at
noun.ring: small circular band, typically of precious metal and often set with one or more gemstones, worn on a finger as an ornament or a token of marriage, engagement, or authority

verb.run: Move at a speed faster than a walk, never having both or all the feet on the ground at the same time
verb.sing: Make musical sounds with the voice, especially words with a set tune
verb.swim: Propel the body through water by using the limbs, or (in the case of a fish or other aquatic animal) by using fins, tail, or other bodily movement
verb.dance: Move rhythmically to music, typically following a set sequence of steps
